requestData(base, ziel, wert)[source]¶

Calculates the result Data

Parameters:
  • base – The base currency for example “EUR”
  • ziel – The goal currency for example “USD,CAD”
  • wert – The how much money of the base currency you have

A String with all the information

requestData(base, ziel, wert)[source]¶

Sends a request to the API with a Json in return and Calculates the new value for the new currency :param wert: The value who needs to be converted into the new currency :param ziel: The goal currency :param base: The start currency :returns: A String with all the information

Model.Online module¶

class Model.Online.Online[source]¶

Bases: Model.Abstract.Abstract

The Online Class for the Online-Usage

requestData(base, ziel, wert)[source]¶

Sends a request to the API with a Json in return and forwards the data to umrechnen :Var wert The value who needs to be converted into the new currency :param ziel: the goal currency :param base: the start currency

Returns:A String with all the information
umrechnen()[source]¶

Calculates the new value for the new currency and creates a useful output

Returns:A HTMl output as String
